sqlMap.statement: SELECT DCC.DS_COND_CONST_CD AS DS_COND_CONST_CD ,DCC.DS_COND_CONST_NM AS DS_COND_CONST_NM ,DCC.DS_COND_CONST_VAL_TXT_01 AS WMS_TASK_CD ,DCC.DS_COND_CONST_VAL_TXT_02 AS WMS_ORD_STS_CD ,DCC.DS_COND_CONST_VAL_TXT_03 AS INTF_TP_ID FROM DS_COND_CONST DCC WHERE DCC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #GLBL_CMPY_CD# AND DCC.DS_COND_CONST_GRP_ID = #DS_COND_CONST_GRP_ID# AND DCC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

SELECT I01.EZINTIME ,I01.INTERFACE_ID ,I01.TRANSACTION_ID ,I01.SEGMENT_ID ,I01.UNIT_ID ,I01.SEQ_NUMBER ,I01.WMS_REC_ID ,I01.TPL_FROM_PTNR_ID ,I01.TPL_TO_PTNR_ID ,I01.REQ_DT_TM_TS_TXT ,I01.OTBD_ORD_NUM ,I01.WMS_ITEM_DESC_TXT ,I01.OTBD_ORD_TP_CD ,I01.WMS_JOB_ID ,I01.TPL_EMP_ID ,I01.TPL_ACCT_TXT ,I01.TPL_LOC_TXT ,I01.SHIP_NM_ALL_TXT ,I01.SHIP_ADDR_ALL_TXT ,I01.SHIP_CTY_TXT ,I01.SHIP_ST_PROV_TXT AS SHIP_ST_OR_PROV_TXT ,I01.SHIP_ZIP_POST_CD AS SHIP_ZIP_OR_POST_CD_TXT ,I01.SHIP_CTRY_TXT ,I01.SHIP_CTAC_NM_TXT ,I01.SHIP_PHO_NUM_TXT ,I01.CARR_CD ,I01.SHPG_SVC_LVL_CD ,I01.WMS_ORD_STS_CD ,I01.ORIG_ORD_QTY_TXT ,I01.SO_STS_NUM ,I01.SHIP_TASK_ID ,I01.DESC_HIST_TXT ,I01.PLN_DT_TMTS_TXT ,I01.PLN_LCL_TXT ,I01.CPLT_DT_TMTS_TXT ,I01.CPLT_LCL_TXT ,I01.SHIP_LCL_TZ ,I01.SHIP_LCL_TZ_SHORT_TXT ,I01.CMPY_SHORT_NM ,I01.LAST_QUOTE_DLV_DT_TXT ,I01.REQ_QUOTE_DLV_DT_TXT ,I01.QUOTE_DLV_DT_TXT ,I01.SHIP_SVC_ID ,I01.SHIP_SPCL_METH_TXT ,I01.TPL_CARR_NM ,I01.TPL_SVC_LVL_NM ,I01.TPL_SPCL_SVC_NM
,I01.CARR_ENC_TRK_URL
,I01.BOL_VCH_NUM
,SO.SO_NUM ,RS.RTL_SWH_CD ,RS.INVTY_LOC_CD ,TPL.TPL_LOC_CD ,I01.SHIP_SVC_ID
,DCC.DS_COND_CONST_VAL_TXT_01 AS WMS_TASK_CD ,DCC.DS_COND_CONST_VAL_TXT_02 AS WMS_ORD_STS_CD ,DCC.DS_COND_CONST_VAL_TXT_03 AS INTF_TP_ID
,I01.SHIP_LCL_TZ ,I01.SHIP_LCL_TZ_SHORT_TXT
FROM NLBI1420_01 I01 ,SHPG_ORD SO ,TPL_LOC TPL ,RTL_SWH RS
,DS_COND_CONST DCC
WHERE I01.INTERFACE_ID = #INTERFACE_ID# AND I01.TRANSACTION_ID = #TRANSACTION_ID# AND I01.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND SO.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) = #GLBL_CMPY_CD# AND SO.SO_NUM(+) = I01.OTBD_ORD_NUM AND SO.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND TPL.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) = #GLBL_CMPY_CD# AND I01.TPL_LOC_TXT(+) = TPL.TPL_LOC_NM AND TPL.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND TPL.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) = RS.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND TPL.TPL_LOC_CD(+) = RS.RTL_WH_CD
AND TPL.WH_OWNR_CD(+) = #WH_OWNR_CD#
AND RS.RTL_SWH_DSBL_FLG(+) = #RTL_SWH_DSBL_FLG# AND RS.PRTY_LOC_FLG(+) = #PRTY_LOC_FLG# AND RS.EFF_FROM_DT(+) <= #SALES_DATE# AND RS.EFF_THRU_DT(+) >= #SALES_DATE# AND RS.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0'
AND DCC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #GLBL_CMPY_CD# AND DCC.DS_COND_CONST_GRP_ID = #DS_COND_CONST_GRP_ID# AND I01.SHIP_TASK_ID = DCC.DS_COND_CONST_NM(+) AND DCC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
ORDER BY I01.INTERFACE_ID ,I01.SEGMENT_ID ,I01.UNIT_ID ,I01.SEQ_NUMBER ,SO.SO_NUM

SELECT DISTINCT TEL.TECH_TOC_CD FROM TECH_LOC TEL WHERE TEL.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #GLBL_CMPY_CD#
AND TEL.TECH_LOC_CD = #TECH_LOC_CD#
AND TEL.TECH_TOC_CD = #TECH_TOC_CD#
AND TEL.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

SELECT I02.INTERFACE_ID ,I02.TRANSACTION_ID ,I02.SEGMENT_ID ,I02.UNIT_ID ,I02.SEQ_NUMBER ,I02.WMS_REC_ID ,I02.QTY_ORD_TXT ,I02.ITEM_CD_TXT ,I02.TPL_LOC_TXT
--,I02.ORD_LINE_NUM ,CASE WHEN INSTRB(I02.ORD_LINE_NUM, '.') > 0 THEN SUBSTR(I02.ORD_LINE_NUM, 1, INSTRB(I02.ORD_LINE_NUM, '.')-1) ELSE I02.ORD_LINE_NUM END AS ORD_LINE_NUM
FROM NLBI1420_02 I02 WHERE I02.INTERFACE_ID = #INTERFACE_ID# AND I02.SEGMENT_ID = #SEGMENT_ID# AND I02.TRANSACTION_ID = #TRANSACTION_ID#
ORDER BY I02.INTERFACE_ID ,I02.TRANSACTION_ID ,I02.UNIT_ID ,I02.ORD_LINE_NUM

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT TC.TPL_CARR_SVC_LVL_CD ,TC.CARR_CD ,TC.SHPG_SVC_LVL_CD FROM TPL_CARR_SVC_LVL TC WHERE TC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #GLBL_CMPY_CD# AND TC.WH_OWNR_CD = 'MNX'
AND TC.TPL_CARR_NM = #TPL_CARR_NM#
AND TC.TPL_SVC_LVL_NM = #TPL_SVC_LVL_NM#
AND TC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY TC.TPL_CARR_SVC_LVL_SORT_NUM ) WHERE ROWNUM<=1

SELECT DCC.DS_COND_CONST_CD AS DS_COND_CONST_CD ,DCC.DS_COND_CONST_VAL_TXT_01 AS PRCH_REQ_TP_NM ,DCC.DS_COND_CONST_VAL_TXT_02 AS DELY_DAYS ,DCC.DS_COND_CONST_VAL_TXT_03 AS DELY_TM ,DCC.DS_COND_CONST_VAL_TXT_04 AS PRCH_REQ_TP_CD ,DCC.DS_COND_CONST_VAL_TXT_06 AS SHPG_SVC_LVL_CD ,DCC.DS_COND_CONST_VAL_TXT_09 AS DELY_HOURS FROM DS_COND_CONST DCC WHERE DCC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #GLBL_CMPY_CD# AND DCC.DS_COND_CONST_GRP_ID = #DS_COND_CONST_GRP_ID# AND DCC.DS_COND_CONST_VAL_TXT_06 = #SHPG_SVC_LVL_CD# AND DCC.DS_COND_CONST_VAL_TXT_10 = 'Y' AND DCC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY DCC.DS_COND_CONST_VAL_TXT_04 ASC /* PRCH_REQ_TP_CD */

SELECT SO.GLBL_CMPY_CD ,SO.WH_CD ,CCC.S80_CMPY_CD ,SO.SO_NUM ,SO.TRX_HDR_NUM ,SO.PICK_TKT_NUM ,SO.CUST_ISS_PO_NUM ,SO.SELL_TO_CUST_CD ,SO.BILL_TO_CUST_CD ,CASE WHEN SO.DROP_SHIP_FLG='Y' THEN '999999' ELSE SO.SHIP_TO_CUST_CD END SHIP_TO_CUST_CD ,SO.SCE_ORD_TP_CD ,SOT.S80_ORD_TP_CD ,SOT.S80_TRX_CD ,OSC.TRX_SRC_TP_CD ,NVL(SO.EXPT_SHPG_METH_CD, SVC.S80_SHIP_VIA_CD) SO_SHIP_VIA_CD ,NVL(SM.SHPG_METH_NM, SSV.S80_SHIP_VIA_NM) SHIP_VIA_DESC_TXT ,SO.SO_CRAT_TS ,SO.PSD_DT ,SO.RDD_DT ,SO.DNLD_TM_TS ,STC.S80_SHPG_TERM_CD ,SST.S80_SHPG_TERM_NM ,SO.CARR_CD ,SO.DROP_SHIP_FLG ,SO.PRINT_SCC_LB_FLG ,SO.PRINT_UCC_LB_FLG ,SO.MIX_PLT_ALLW_FLG ,SO.PRINT_PLT_UCC_LB_FLG ,SO.PRINT_NON_ASN_UCC_LB_FLG ,SO.ASN_REQ_FLG ,NVL(SO.UCC_NUM_CD, '1') IND_UCC_NUM_FLG ,SO.EDI_TP_CD ,SO.CUST_STORE_NUM --,SO.CUST_STORE_NUM ,SO.SO_DEPT_NUM ,SO.TOT_SHIP_AMT ,( SELECT SUM(NVL(D.TOT_SHPG_WT, 0)) FROM SHPG_ORD_DTL D WHERE D.GLBL_CMPY_CD=SO.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND D.SO_NUM=SO.SO_NUM AND D.EZCANCELFLAG='0' ) TOT_WT_AMT_NUM ,SO.RTRN_LB_CD ,SO.SO_CONFIG_FLG --,TPL_CARR_CD --,TPL_SVC_LVL_CD ,SO.CARR_ACCT_NUM --,SO.WH_CD ,NVL(SO.SCHD_DELY_DT, SO.RDD_DT) WMS_SCHD_DELY_DT ,NVL(SO.CARR_CD, SO.VND_CD) WMS_CARR_CD ,SO.SHPG_SVC_LVL_CD --,SO.TRX_HDR_NUM --,SO.SO_CONFIG_FLG ,( SELECT CASE WHEN CNT>0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM MDSE M, SHPG_ORD_DTL D WHERE M.RTRN_REQ_PRT_FLG='Y' AND M.GLBL_CMPY_CD=D.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND M.MDSE_CD=D.MDSE_CD AND D.GLBL_CMPY_CD=SO.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND D.SO_NUM=SO.SO_NUM AND M.EZCANCELFLAG='0' AND D.EZCANCELFLAG='0' ) ) RTRN_ITEM_INCL_FLG ,SO.SVC_CONFIG_MSTR_PK ,SO.PRE_ISTL_SHOP_RQST_FLG ,( SELECT CASE WHEN CNT<=0 THEN '1' ELSE '2' END FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM WMS_INBD_SO_HDR H WHERE H.GLBL_CMPY_CD=SO.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND H.WMS_SO_ID=SO.SO_NUM AND H.EZCANCELFLAG='0' ) ) STAGE_ACT_CD ,SO.WMS_RTE_PATH_CD --,SO.SCE_ORD_TP_CD ,SOT.SCE_ORD_TP_NM --,OTBD_SRC_OTD_TP_TXT --,PRT_TO_CUST_FLG ,SO.SRC_ORD_NUM --,SLS_ORD_ADMIN_NM --,SLS_REP_PSN_NM ,SHIP.SO_CUST_LINE_LOC_NM_01 SHIP_SO_CUST_LINE_LOC_NM_01 ,SHIP.SO_CUST_LINE_LOC_NM_02 SHIP_SO_CUST_LINE_LOC_NM_02 ,SHIP.SO_CUST_LINE_ADDR_01 SHIP_SO_CUST_LINE_ADDR_01 ,SHIP.SO_CUST_LINE_ADDR_02 SHIP_SO_CUST_LINE_ADDR_02 ,SHIP.SO_CUST_LINE_ADDR_03 SHIP_SO_CUST_LINE_ADDR_03 ,SHIP.SO_CUST_LINE_ADDR_04 SHIP_SO_CUST_LINE_ADDR_04 ,SHIP.CTY_ADDR SHIP_CTY_ADDR ,SHIP.ST_CD SHIP_ST_CD ,SHIP.POST_CD SHIP_POST_CD ,SHIP.CTRY_CD SHIP_CTRY_CD ,SHIP.CTAC_PTNR_PSN_NM SHIP_CTAC_PTNR_PSN_NM ,SHIP.CTAC_PTNR_PSN_TEL_NUM SHIP_CTAC_PTNR_PSN_TEL_NUM ,SELL.SO_CUST_LINE_LOC_NM_01 SELL_SO_CUST_LINE_LOC_NM_01 ,SELL.SO_CUST_LINE_LOC_NM_02 SELL_SO_CUST_LINE_LOC_NM_02 ,SELL.SO_CUST_LINE_ADDR_01 SELL_SO_CUST_LINE_ADDR_01 ,SELL.SO_CUST_LINE_ADDR_02 SELL_SO_CUST_LINE_ADDR_02 ,SELL.SO_CUST_LINE_ADDR_03 SELL_SO_CUST_LINE_ADDR_03 ,SELL.SO_CUST_LINE_ADDR_04 SELL_SO_CUST_LINE_ADDR_04 ,SELL.CTY_ADDR SELL_CTY_ADDR ,SELL.ST_CD SELL_ST_CD ,SELL.POST_CD SELL_POST_CD ,SELL.CTRY_CD SELL_CTRY_CD ,SELL.CTAC_PTNR_PSN_NM SELL_CTAC_PTNR_PSN_NM ,SELL.CTAC_PTNR_PSN_TEL_NUM SELL_CTAC_PTNR_PSN_TEL_NUM ,BILL.SO_CUST_LINE_LOC_NM_01 BILL_SO_CUST_LINE_LOC_NM_01 ,BILL.SO_CUST_LINE_LOC_NM_02 BILL_SO_CUST_LINE_LOC_NM_02 ,BILL.SO_CUST_LINE_ADDR_01 BILL_SO_CUST_LINE_ADDR_01 ,BILL.SO_CUST_LINE_ADDR_02 BILL_SO_CUST_LINE_ADDR_02 ,BILL.SO_CUST_LINE_ADDR_03 BILL_SO_CUST_LINE_ADDR_03 ,BILL.SO_CUST_LINE_ADDR_04 BILL_SO_CUST_LINE_ADDR_04 ,BILL.CTY_ADDR BILL_CTY_ADDR ,BILL.ST_CD BILL_ST_CD ,BILL.POST_CD BILL_POST_CD ,BILL.CTRY_CD BILL_CTRY_CD ,BILL.CTAC_PTNR_PSN_NM BILL_CTAC_PTNR_PSN_NM ,BILL.CTAC_PTNR_PSN_TEL_NUM BILL_CTAC_PTNR_PSN_TEL_NUM -- COLUMNS FOR WMS_INBD_TRX... ,RW.INVTY_OWNR_CD ,TL.WMS_ORG_HOST_ID FROM SHPG_ORD SO ,CMPY_CD_CONV CCC ,SCE_ORD_TP SOT ,ORD_SRC_CONV OSC ,SHPG_METH SM ,SHIP_VIA_CONV SVC ,S80_SHIP_VIA SSV ,SHPG_TERM_CONV STC ,S80_SHPG_TERM SST ,SHPG_ORD_CUST_DTL SHIP ,SHPG_ORD_CUST_DTL SELL ,SHPG_ORD_CUST_DTL BILL -- TABLES FOR WMS_INBD_TRX... ,RTL_WH RW ,TPL_LOC TL WHERE SO.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #GLBL_CMPY_CD# AND SO.SO_NUM = #SO_NUM# AND SO.GLBL_CMPY_CD = RW.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND SO.WH_CD = RW.RTL_WH_CD AND RW.WH_SYS_TP_CD = #WH_SYS_TP_CD# AND RW.WH_OWNR_CD = 'MNX' AND SO.GLBL_CMPY_CD = CCC.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND SO.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SOT.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND SO.SCE_ORD_TP_CD = SOT.SCE_ORD_TP_CD(+) AND SOT.INBD_OTBD_CD(+) = #INBD_OTBD_CD# AND SO.GLBL_CMPY_CD = OSC.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND SO.TRX_SRC_TP_CD = OSC.TRX_SRC_TP_CD(+) AND SO.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SM.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND SO.EXPT_SHPG_METH_CD = SM.SHPG_METH_CD(+) AND SO.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SVC.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND SO.SHPG_SVC_LVL_CD = SVC.SHPG_SVC_LVL_CD(+) AND SVC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SSV.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND SVC.S80_SHIP_VIA_CD = SSV.S80_SHIP_VIA_CD(+) AND SO.GLBL_CMPY_CD = STC.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND SO.FRT_CHRG_TO_CD = STC.FRT_CHRG_TO_CD(+) AND SO.FRT_CHRG_METH_CD = STC.FRT_CHRG_METH_CD(+) AND STC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SST.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND STC.S80_SHPG_TERM_CD = SST.S80_SHPG_TERM_CD(+) AND SO.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SHIP.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND SO.SO_NUM = SHIP.SO_NUM(+) AND SHIP.SO_CUST_DATA_TP_CD(+) = #SO_CUST_DATA_TP_CD_SHIP# AND SO.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SELL.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND SO.SO_NUM = SELL.SO_NUM(+) AND SELL.SO_CUST_DATA_TP_CD(+) = #SO_CUST_DATA_TP_CD_SELL# AND SO.GLBL_CMPY_CD = BILL.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND SO.SO_NUM = BILL.SO_NUM(+) AND BILL.SO_CUST_DATA_TP_CD(+) = #SO_CUST_DATA_TP_CD_BILL# AND SO.GLBL_CMPY_CD = TL.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND SO.WH_CD = TL.TPL_LOC_CD(+) AND SO.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND RW.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND CCC.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND SOT.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND OSC.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND SM.EZCANCELFLAG (+) = '0' AND SSV.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND STC.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND SST.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND SHIP.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND SELL.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND BILL.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND TL.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' ORDER BY SO.GLBL_CMPY_CD ,SO.SO_NUM

SELECT SOD.GLBL_CMPY_CD ,SOD.SO_NUM ,SOD.SO_SLP_NUM ,SOD.MDSE_CD ,SSCF.S80_STK_STS_CD ,SOD.CUST_MDSE_CD ,SOD.RQST_ORD_QTY ,SOD.SHPG_BAL_QTY ,SOD.SHPG_QTY ,SOD.UNIT_PRC_AMT ,SOD.DISC_PRC_AMT ,SOD.DISC_UNIT_PRC_AMT ,SOD.SER_NUM_TAKE_FLG --,IND_VOID_ALLW_FLG ,SSCT.S80_STK_STS_CD S80_STK_STS_TO_CD ,SOD.SET_MDSE_CD ,SOD.SET_MDSE_NM ,SOD.SET_SHPG_QTY ,SOD.IN_EACH_QTY ,SOD.TOT_SHPG_WT ,SOD.TOT_SHPG_VOL ,SOD.BAT_NUM_TAKE_FLG ,SOD.CONFIG_ITEM_FLG ,SOD.RTL_WH_CD ,SOD.RTL_SWH_CD ,SOD.PICK_SVC_CONFIG_MSTR_PK ,SOD.BACK_ORD_IMPCT_TP_CD ,SOD.TRX_LINE_NUM --,SOD.CONFIG_ITEM_FLG ,SOD.RMV_CONFIG_FLG ,NVL(CD.ORD_QTY, SOD.RQST_ORD_QTY) ORIG_ORD_QTY -- COLUMNS FOR WMS_INBD_TRX ,SOD.FROM_STK_STS_CD ,(SOD.SHPG_QTY-SOD.SHIP_QTY) UNSHIP_QTY FROM SHPG_ORD_DTL SOD ,STK_STS_CONV SSCF ,STK_STS_CONV SSCT ,CPO_DTL CD WHERE SOD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #GLBL_CMPY_CD# AND SOD.SO_NUM = #SO_NUM#
#elem[]#
AND SOD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SSCF.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND SOD.FROM_STK_STS_CD = SSCF.STK_STS_CD(+) AND SOD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SSCT.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND SOD.TO_STK_STS_CD = SSCT.STK_STS_CD(+) AND SOD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = CD.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND SOD.TRX_HDR_NUM = CD.CPO_ORD_NUM(+) AND SOD.TRX_LINE_NUM = CD.CPO_DTL_LINE_NUM(+) AND SOD.TRX_LINE_SUB_NUM = CD.CPO_DTL_LINE_SUB_NUM(+) AND SOD.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND SSCF.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND SSCT.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND CD.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' ORDER BY SOD.GLBL_CMPY_CD ,SOD.SO_NUM ,SOD.SO_SLP_NUM

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT TC.TPL_CARR_CD ,TC.TPL_SVC_LVL_CD FROM TPL_CARR_SVC_LVL TC WHERE TC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #GLBL_CMPY_CD# AND TC.WH_OWNR_CD = 'MNX'
AND TC.CARR_CD = #CARR_CD#
AND TC.CARR_CD IS NULL
AND TC.SHPG_SVC_LVL_CD = #SHPG_SVC_LVL_CD#
AND TC.SHPG_SVC_LVL_CD IS NULL
AND TC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY TC.TPL_CARR_SVC_LVL_SORT_NUM ) WHERE ROWNUM<=1

SELECT SOM.GLBL_CMPY_CD ,SOM.SO_NUM ,SOM.SO_MSG_TP_CD ,SOM.TXT_SQ_NUM ,SOM.SO_MSG_DESC_TXT FROM SHPG_ORD_MSG SOM WHERE SOM.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #GLBL_CMPY_CD# AND SOM.SO_NUM = #SO_NUM# AND SOM.SO_MSG_TP_CD = #SO_MSG_TP_CD# AND SOM.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY SOM.GLBL_CMPY_CD ,SOM.SO_NUM ,SOM.SO_MSG_TP_CD ,SOM.TXT_SQ_NUM

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WMS_INBD_TRX WIT WHERE WIT.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND WIT.WH_CD = #whCd# AND WIT.PRO_NUM = #proNum# AND WIT.WMS_TASK_CD = #wmsTaskCd# AND WIT.WMS_SHIP_DT_TM_TS = #wmsShipDtTmTs# AND WIT.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SHPG_ORD SO ,WMS_INBD_SO_HDR WISH WHERE SO.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND SO.SO_NUM = #soNum# AND SO.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND WISH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SO.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND WISH.WMS_SO_ID = SO.SO_NUM AND WISH.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
